bio:
A BCIT Computer System Technology graduate. I have extensive knowledge and project experience of front-end development. I am confident with React, Typescript, Material UI, Sass, UI/UX, and RESTful API designs.
Beside my academic and career, I am a competitive powerlifter competed at Provincial Champion. My dream is one day step into the Canadian Powerlifting Union Stage and competed in national level.

skills.title: UI/UX Design
skills.content: I am proficient with Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Xd to design elegent responsive layout. I also have a lot of music video project experience with Adobe Affects.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.content: I am a full stack web developer with expereince of basic html, css, javascript, MySQL, MongoDB, React, and others tools to create dynamic websites.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.content: I am familiar with React Natvie for cross-platform development, and also have some project experience with Android and Swift ios development

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Built large scale project with serverless compuation, collaborate with other teams to produce high quality code.

experiences.title: Computer System Technology Diploma
experiences.description: Created multiple web porjects with peers by using html, css, and javascript. Proficient programming with C and Java.

experiences.title: Bachelor of Arts in Economics
experiences.description: Achieved 3 times Dean's Honor Roll with excellent academic records. Enhanced my critical thinking by taking advance Economics courses.
